description:
Haruomi was http://anidb.net/ch45096 [Akito]`s friend back when he was in Kyoto. Even though her name is masculine, she`s still a girl. She transferred into Saint Liliana Academy to be with Akito. Her moods tend to swing, but she loves to play around by teasing Akito.
Source: ANN
name: Sawatari Ginbee Haruomi
